name: tm52
effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user attacks at full power.
It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def
stat if it hits.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user attacks at full power.
It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def
stat if it hits.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user attacks at full power.
It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def
stat if it hits.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user heightens its mental focus and
unleashes its power.
It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user heightens its mental focus and
unleashes its power.
It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes

flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may
also poison the target.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user bounces up high, then drops on the target
on the second turn. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.
